item.title: Answer plz
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

MoparScape is not a server; it’s a client. Basically, the server is a bunch of coding that describes occurences in a game, and the client is what connects to the server and lets you see those occurences.

Read full topic

item.title: Answer plz
item.dc:creator: @allstar63435 allstar63435
item.description:
@allstar63435 wrote:

how do i get other scapes besides moparscape31

Read full topic

item.title: Answer plz
item.dc:creator: @Sepranem Sepranem
item.description:
@Sepranem wrote:

Almost everything. The servers are what have the features, so some servers could include duel arena while others wouldn’t. Different servers also have different “under the hood” type features, such as being anti-lag, or having an anti-auto feature. Some also log chat to the command window of the host. To sum it all up, in essence all the major “scapes” are different in countless ways. The reason people can’t see this is because almost all of the people running their own server just use TestScape, CheezScape, or some other popular source.

Read full topic
